attributes.action: allow the Red Arrows to fly at the London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the Red Arrows are British then surely they should be allowed to fly at such a major British event. we as a nation are very proud of our prestigeous flyers, that the rest of the world respects. Why are we not allowed to be proud of our National achievers?, allowed to fly our own national flag, and speak up for ourselves. 
The English seem to be penalised more than the Scots, Welsh and Irish for being English.we are all British.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
